void aruco::Board::glGetModelViewMatrix ( double  modelview_matrix[16]) throw (cv::Exception)

Given the extrinsic camera parameters returns the GL_MODELVIEW matrix for opengl.

Setting this matrix, the reference corrdinate system will be set in this board

void aruco::Board::OgreGetPoseParameters ( double  position[3],
double  orientation[4] 
) throw (cv::Exception)

Returns position vector and orientation quaternion for an Ogre scene node or entity.

Use: ... Ogre::Vector3 ogrePos (position[0], position[1], position[2]); Ogre::Quaternion ogreOrient (orientation[0], orientation[1], orientation[2], orientation[3]); mySceneNode->setPosition( ogrePos ); mySceneNode->setOrientation( ogreOrient ); ...
